title: ISic003867. I.Sicily inscription 003867
body:
1Ἰσιά̣δ̣ος

1ΙΣΙ..ΟΣ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Meligunìs Lipára XII;
  • 1: ΚΙΜΟΣ Bernabò Brea - Cavalier Fraser - Matthews LGPN V3A: 39500

translation

commentary

The inscription, unusually placed at a certain distance from the upper edge, falls along the fracture, such that the lower parts of the first letters are damaged; it is not possible to establish whether other lines followed.

bibliography

  • 202 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000541
